          <title>
            <string language="en">Bone mass loss</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Knochenmassenverlust</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Perte de masse d'os</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This line graph shows the decrease in the bone density of women as they age.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bone density</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Zeile Diagramm zeigt die Abnahme an der 
Knochendichte der Frauen, während sie altern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphe par ligne montre la diminution de la 
densité d'os des femmes pendant qu'elles vieillissent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta linha gráfico mostra a diminuição na 
densidade do osso das mulheres enquanto envelhecem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico lineare mostra la diminuzione 
nella densità dell'osso delle donne mentre invecchiano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση γραμμών εμφανίζει τη μείωση
στην πυκνότητα κόκκαλων των γυναικών καθώς γερνούν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta línea gráfico muestra la disminución de la
densidad del hueso de mujeres mientras que envejecen.</string>
          </description>
